jobs.description: Create next-level user experiences for gamers. Focus on immersive interfaces and visual storytelling within gaming ecosystems.
jobs.proposalDraft: Hello Sprung Studios! My portfolio at portfolio-shared.vercel.app features several immersive, high-motion interfaces that align perfectly with the gaming industry's demand for dynamic UX. I've highlighted my 'Visual Storytelling' projects which I believe are a direct match for this role...

jobs.description: Support design initiatives for enterprise HR platforms. Focus on clean, consistent, and user-friendly interfaces.
jobs.proposalDraft: Hi Rippling Team! I specialize in creating consistent design systems for complex platforms. My recent work on enterprise-level dashboard components (viewable at portfolio-shared.vercel.app) demonstrates my ability to handle the scale and precision Rippling requires...

jobs.description: Lead visual and motion direction for core campaigns. Designing high-end animated assets and visual narratives.
jobs.proposalDraft: Hi there! Looking at your need for high-end animated assets, my 'Swaying Gallery' and 'Text Morph' experiments at portfolio-shared.vercel.app are testament to my expertise in motion-driven visual narratives. I'd love to bring this dynamic energy to your core campaigns...
